comment: Took her for the online summer course and class was very smooth. Reading discussion due every week and 2 responses plus short quizzes that were easy. She was sweet and gives extra credit at the end! I would definitely retake her again!!

2 group projects, 3 forum short-essays, 3 discussion posts, and a final project/paper. Lecture and content was interesting and engaging. Liked to have open discussions about the readings. Had to do two group projects, weren't that bad. Doesn't take attendance but will do attendance quizzes if too many people stop coming. Relatable and funny
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Amazing lectures

comment: Easy A. There are 2 group projects and one final solo project. No exams! She has weekly readings. I never read one, i skimmed through before class and that was enough. theres three 500-word writing assignments for the whole semester and like 2 discussions. The course is light work and she's a fun teacher. lectures are fun, easy to go to class.

Weekly work was a little excessive for an online class. (1-3)15-pg reading/ discussion due wednesday. Reading logs/questions of readings, 2 discussion responses, and short quiz question+sample answer+explanation due Sunday. The readings/videos were fairly interesting so they were too hard to get through.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework
